title: Twitter Surges After Activists Seek to Replace Dorsey
itunes:title: Twitter Surges After Activists Seek to Replace Dorsey
description:
Bloomberg News Deals Reporter Scott Deveau discusses Twitter surging after activists seek to replace CEO Jack Dorsey. Nick Parrish, Managing Director at Cresset Partners, talks about investing in opportunity zones. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Financial Regulation Reporter Elizabeth Dexheimer walk through the fate of Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac. Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director Andy Browne breaks down why deglobalization is accelerating as China has lost investor trust. And we Drive to the Close with Charlie Smith, Co-Founder and CIO at Fort Pitt Capital Group. 

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
